cql:
library QDMTestMeasure version '0.0.000'

using QDM version '5.6'

include TestMATGlobal version '1.0.000' called Global

codesystem "SNOMEDCT": 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.6.96' 

valueset "Encounter Inpatient": 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.3.666.5.307'

code "Dead (finding)": '419099009' from "SNOMEDCT" display 'Dead (finding)'

parameter "Measurement Period" Interval<DateTime>

context Patient

  
define "Initial Population":
  "Qualifying Encounters"

define "Qualifying Encounters":
  ["Encounter, Performed": "Encounter Inpatient"] Encounter
    where Encounter.relevantPeriod ends during "Measurement Period"
